emailTemplate.name: ResetYourPassword
emailTemplate.subject: TicketMuffin - Reset your password
emailTemplate.html:
Hi @(Model.Account.FirstName??"there"),

To reset your password, click or copy/paste the following url into your web browser:

http://www.ticketmuffin.com/account/password-reset/@Model.Account.ResetPasswordToken

You'll be prompted to provide a new password, and then you'll be able to login.

Regards,

TicketMuffin
